title: Bug 3970[preferences] UI needed to define the default line delimiters for new files (1GFIOAX)
description: Bug 3970[preferences] UI needed to define the default line delimiters for new files (1GFIOAX) the Windows work stations are used as X terminals and to run Eclipse (since PC are cheaper than Unix boxes).
OB: The new files created on Windows have Windows line delimiters instead of Unix line delimiters.
EB: Even if the new file is created on Windows, it should have Unix line delimiters since the end product is a Unix product. A UI (Preference) should be provided in the Workbench to define the line delimiter for new files. Possible values should include Dos/Windows, Mac, Unix, and the default platform line delimiter. This UI should be consistent across all plugins to ensure the same line delimiter is used for new files.
SR: To reproduce the issue, consider the following scenario: Use Unix and Windows workstations to develop a Unix product/program.
